content: Very nice. Modularization would seem to support faster adoption of voice activated, artificial intelligence augmented (or at least supported as a service) design? Yes, a question. Just so happens this is an area that I have worked in across the last 29 or so years. Design is that special place where what makes us human intersects with our tools to yield “artifacts” and in the hands of exceptional craftspeople, art. Let’s push the bounds! Cheers, Hank
